div.bibl: The Reform Advocate, Wk. of September 6, 1919. Vol. 58, p.110.

body.p: Dr. Joseph Zeisler, dermatologist and professor in the medical school at Northwestern University, died on Sunday. The deceased was born in Austria, sixty-five years ago.
He was the author of many lectures on dermatology. Dr. Zeisler was attending dermatologist at the Michael Reese, Wesley, and Mercy Hospitals.
He was also a member of the Cliff Dwellers, the Chicago Literary, and the City Clubs.
